originalText.text:
The process of renting and getting accepted  was so simple and straightforward!
Both Rome and John are very professional!
Any question that I’ve asked they had perfectly clear answer!
I’m very happy that I decided to start new chapter of my career with Optima salon suites! And on top of that you can design your space however you want!
Dear colleagues I highly recommend them if you’re thinking to start your own business!

originalText.text: I just got my key to my suite today. John and Rome have made my application process so seamless along with being accommodating as well. I definitely recommend them and I look forward to moving into my suite!

originalText.text: John was extremely helpful, showed me the facility and made me feel comfortable to reach out in case I have any other questions. Rome is great, responsive and patient; i had many questions and he handled it with grace. So far so great! Thank you!!
